label: 地頭代
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
説明文: a military steward’s proxy. The jitōdai acted on behalf of the jitō when the latter did not actually reside on the estate to which he was appointed.
